com.tsatsatzu.subwar.game.logic.ai

Interface IComputerPlayer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SimplePlayer

    public interface IComputerPlayer
    The Interface IComputerPlayer. This encapsulates the functionality necessary to make the game moves for computer based players. For each strategy, a new subclass of this can be created and registered with the system.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void init(SWGameBean game, java.lang.String id)
      Initializes the robotic system.
      void move(SWGameBean game, java.lang.String id, long tick)
      Move the robot.
      void term(SWGameBean game, java.lang.String id)
      Terminates the robotic system's connection to this robot player.

    • Method Detail

      • init

        void init(SWGameBean game,
          java.lang.String id)
        Initializes the robotic system. If there is any setup to do for a new robotic player, this is the place to do it.
        Parameters:
        game - the game object
        id - the robot's id

      • move

        void move(SWGameBean game,
          java.lang.String id,
          long tick)
        Move the robot. Whatever logic is necessary to choose what a robot can do, should be done here.
        Parameters:
        game - the game object
        id - the robot's id
        tick - the elapsed time

      • term

        void term(SWGameBean game,
          java.lang.String id)
        Terminates the robotic system's connection to this robot player. If there is any cleanup to do for a new robotic player, this is the place to do it.
        Parameters:
        game - the game object
        id - the robot's id
